name: Enviromorph
description:
Enviromorph

Enviromorph is a game where you are a shapeshifting alien sent to a planet to check out whether or not it is inhabitable. On the way to the planet, you see four different things; an astronaut, a snowman, a fox and a turtle. Because you have seen these creatures, you are now able to morph into them (each creature having its own pros and cons to surviving certain environmental hazards). You must adapt to survive whatever obstacle is thrown at you!

Controls

W -up

A - left

D - right

S - down

Space Bar - Jump

U - fox 

I - turtle 

O - snowman 

P - astronaut 

Fire kills everyone!

Fox - most versatile but dies to everything

Turtle - slow on land but quick in the water

Snowman - slippery, and immune to cold snaps

Astronaut - no gravity and is immune to disease

Credits

Artist  and Game Design - James Collins

Artist,  Animator and Game Design - Samantha Lindsey

Tech - Bryn McKerracher

Tech Artist - Andrew Savey

Music - Sqriations
